snippet: A number of nongovernmental organizations have contributed aid to Syrian refugees in Lebanon, Jordan and Turkey, but not enough to keep them from fleeing to Europe, according to the United Nations.
lead_paragraph: A number of nongovernmental organizations have contributed aid to Syrian refugees in Lebanon, Jordan and Turkey, but not enough to keep them from fleeing to Europe, according to the United Nations.

headline.main: International Organizations Providing Aid to Syrian Refugees

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis
